text: Horizon is an action role-playing and science fiction video game series developed by Guerrilla Games and published by Sony Interactive Entertainment for the PlayStation 4, PlayStation 5, Nintendo Switch and Microsoft Windows. As of May 2023, the games in the series have sold over 32 million copies around the world. In January 2025, a film adaptation of Horizon Zero Dawn was announced by Sony. == References == Category:Action role-playing video games Category:Action-adventure games Category:Open-world video games Category:Post- apocalyptic video games Category:Science fiction video games Category:Sony Interactive Entertainment games Category:Video game series
